products.title: Splash Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash scarlet red 89mm vertical blind in red. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, their luscious splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash scarlet red is a firey vertical blindslat - perfect for adding a bold, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this red fabric is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Their quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their quality vertical blinds are certainly value for money.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by their blind experts, quality is paramount. At swift direct blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under their belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts, it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout scarlet red 89mm vertical blind in red. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This daring scarlet red vertical blind brings drama to any room and is also reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office! A favourite autumnal colour, passionate red is a warm tone, which means for those colder days, this colour brings the heat. Why not compliment with yellows and oranges for cosy affect, or just pull focus with this shade with minimal contrast.Our best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This fiery red vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out their industry-leading sizesure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse their swifttrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Amor Weathered Collar Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor weathered collar vertical blind
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Memphis Red (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure memphis red (blackout) blackout vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
